name: LetsVoltron
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lets voltron
des: Brought to you by the hosts of Let's Voltron: The Official Voltron Podcast, Lets Voltron is a fun random generator that will provide hours of enjoyment for every Voltron fan. All you have to do is say, "Alexa, Open Lets Voltron", and the response will be a random fun quote that Voltron fans will love.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
